import React, { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; const Contact = () => { const [data, setData] = useState({ fname: "", number: "", email: "", message: "" }); const InputEvent = (event) => { const {name, value} = event.target; setData((preVal) => { return { ...preVal, [name]: value, } }) } const formSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); alert(`Name: ${data.fname} \nNumber: ${data.number} \nEmail: ${data.email} \nMessage: ${data.message} \n`); const newMsg = { fname: data.fname, number: data.number, email: data.email, message: data.message } axios.post("http://localhost:3001/contact", newMsg).then(()=>{console.log("sent")}).catch((e)=>{console.log(e)}); } return ( <>

Contact Me

); }; export default Contact;
